name: scout-platform
description: S.C.O.U.T. SaaS Platform - AI-driven talent acquisition platform

scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:docker
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:backend: docker-compose run --rm backend python -m pytest tests/ -v
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.migrate: docker-compose run --rm backend alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:init: docker-compose up -d postgres redis && timeout 10 && npm run migrate
scripts.clean: docker-compose down -v && docker system prune -f && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && rmdir /s node_modules 2>nul & rmdir /s build 2>nul
scripts.azure:deploy: az staticwebapp deploy && kubectl apply -f infrastructure/kubernetes/

author: S.C.O.U.T. Platform Team
